report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Information]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

---

**Location of Damage:**
- The damage is located on the front fender of the vehicle, near the air intake vent.

**Type of Damage:**
- The damage appears to be a scratch or chip in the paint. The area affected shows a disruption in the paint finish, with visible peeling and exposed metal beneath the surface. There is also a small puncture mark or hole near the edge of the damage.

**Additional Notes:**
- The scratch/chip seems to have occurred recently as there are no signs of rust or further deterioration.
- The surrounding area of the damage looks relatively undamaged, indicating that the impact was localized.

**Recommendation:**
- The recommended course of action would be to repair the damage by applying touch-up paint to match the original color of the vehicle. This will ensure a seamless finish and prevent further corrosion.

---

**Inspection Completed By:**
[Your Name]  
[Your Title]  
[Insurance Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Date of Completion:** [Insert Date]
